short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds debugging and convenience tools for developing Shopify's post-purchase extensions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds debugging and convenience tools for developing Shopify's post-purchase extensions.

Post-purchase checkout extensions allow merchants to add a post-purchase page directly into the Shopify checkout. The post-purchase page appears after the order is confirmed, but before the thank you page.

Once you install this extension, you can specify the URL of a post-purchase extension running locally and have it run on a development store.
